name: William Rucklidge
body: We're all good - we're living in Toronto now (moved back in 2021; bought a house sight unseen; had a quarantine period after entering Canada so we spent two weeks camping out in the house with no furniture or anything; about as stressful as it sounds like). I still work for Google, processing satellite imagery with ML these days.

name: William Rucklidge
body: Wow! That's some hardware! Glad your experience wasn't as painful as it looks, and keep going on the recovery. Oh, and say Hi to Kim for me.

name: kim mondelli
body: William!! So good to see your name pop up! How are you? How is your family?!?!

name: Hunter
body: Way to go pookie! Great post.  So sorry this happened, and it's painful that it happens to someone I love. I'd rather it would have happened to me.  Your strong spirit, as ever, has guided you through amazing and diligent recovery!  Give Tracey a project, and she usually nails it!  - love you lots!
